code: import*as Yup from'yup';import{skillTranslations}from'./validator_translations';var DEFAULT_MAX_ITEMS=12;export var SkillsIsCompleteValidationSchema=function SkillsIsCompleteValidationSchema(){var formatMessage=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:function(){};return Yup.object({skills:Yup.array().required(formatMessage(skillTranslations.atLeastOne)).min(1)});};export var SkillsValidationSchema=function SkillsValidationSchema(){var formatMessage=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:function(){};var options=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:{limitTo:DEFAULT_MAX_ITEMS};var count=Number.isNaN(Number(options.limitTo))?DEFAULT_MAX_ITEMS:options.limitTo;return Yup.object({skills:Yup.array().required(formatMessage(skillTranslations.atLeastOne)).min(1,formatMessage(skillTranslations.atLeastOne)).max(count,formatMessage(skillTranslations.atMost,{count:count}))});};export var validateSkillsComplete=function validateSkillsComplete(data){try{SkillsIsCompleteValidationSchema().validateSync(data);}catch(e){return false;}return true;};
